document_data.name: Lore of the Coast
document_data.author: [[Irigoth Mmar]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Lore of the Coast''''' was a [[book]] penned by [[Irigoth Mmar]], High Sage of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the early 13{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''There in the darkness many a wyrm sits and smiles. He grows rich and lazy and fat as the years pass, and there seems no shortage of fools to challenge him and make him richer and fatter. Well, why wait ye? Open the door and go in!''|Excerpt from ''Lore of the Coast''}}
document_data.History: ''Lore of the Coast'' was published in the {{YearlinkName|1223}}.{{Cite web/The Candlekeep Collection}}
